de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.node

Interface NiftyNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteLayoutChildNode, AbsoluteLayoutNode, AlignmentLayoutChildNode, AlignmentLayoutNode, DockLayoutChildNode, DockLayoutNode, NiftyBackgroundColorNode, NiftyContentNode, NiftyReferenceNode, NiftyRootNode, NiftyTransformationNode, PaddingLayoutNode, SimpleLayoutNode, SizeLayoutNode, StackLayoutNode, UniformStackLayoutNode

    public interface NiftyNode
    The public NiftyNode marker interface. Everything a Nifty scene graph stores is required to implement NiftyNode. Created by void on 23.07.15.
